name: Storyboard Framework Version 0.1
description:
Example here: https://bit.ly/3oZvfN5

Manual inside or here: shorturl.at/ovzAH


The first version of my Storyboard Framework.

Includes the basic operation to do a linear storyboard to do a presentation to stakeholders or have visual cues.


Version 0.2 planned features:

Branching storyline elements support like:

  • Timed Choices UI (an autofilling bar with interchangeable time).
  • Dialog Choices UI (Up to three choices like Good, Bad, Neutral)
  • Hint and Objectives UI (Put an RPG style UI on your prototype)
